title: The aquaculture revolution is coming | Gibran Huzaifah
description: Aquaculture — or the practice of farming in water — is the fastest-growing food system in the world, says tech entrepreneur Gibran Huzaifah. He shares the story of how a moment of near-starvation during his university years sparked his mission to take on global hunger, starting with a tech platform that empowers small-scale fish farmers, dramatically increasing their output and income. He asks: Can feeding fish help feed the world?
author: Gibran Huzaifah

html:
Aquaculture — or the practice of farming in water — is the fastest-growing food system in the world, says tech entrepreneur Gibran Huzaifah. He shares the story of how a moment of near-starvation during his university years sparked his mission to take on global hunger, starting with a tech platform that empowers small-scale fish farmers, dramatically increasing their output and income. He asks: Can feeding fish help feed the world?
